amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 117-253 to require the DOD to submit to Congress a report on sources of PFAS on military installations other than AFFF and any recommendation regarding whether to expand eligibility for the registry to individuals exposed to PFAS from other sources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Ross.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
